io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.compaction

Interface CompactionTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MajorCompactionTask, MinorCompactionTask

    public interface CompactionTask
extends Runnable
    Performs compaction on a set of log Segments.

    Compaction tasks are responsible for compacting one or more segments in a Log. Tasks are provided by a related CompactionManager and are run in parallel in a pool of Storage.compactionThreads() background threads.

    Author:

      • Method Summary

        • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

          run
